triples.name: Cluster analysis
triples.relevance: Clustering is the main problem domain that the paper addresses using silhouette scores.

triples.name: K-means clustering
triples.relevance: K-means is the primary clustering algorithm used in the paper for partitioning data into clusters.

triples.name: Silhouette (clustering)
triples.relevance: Silhouette score is the core technique used to evaluate and validate cluster quality and determine optimal cluster numbers.

triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: Data mining is the broader field that clustering belongs to and provides context for the work.

triples.name: Scikit-learn
triples.relevance: Scikit-learn is the Python machine learning library used to implement the silhouette score method in the study.
